mapper.select: select t.measureid as measureid, t.measurename as measurename from (select rownum rn, m.* from (select d.measure_id as measureid, d.measure_name as measurename from dmd_measure d where d.parent_measure_id like '%IVT%' or d.parent_measure_id like '%FUND%' ) m where rownum <=(#{start}+#{limit})) t where t.rn >#{start}
select count(1) from dmd_measure d where d.parent_measure_id like '%IVT%' or d.parent_measure_id like '%FUND%'
